description:
*Please visit the official DRAGON BALL Xenoverse 2 web site for more information on each DLC.
*You may first need to update to the latest version.

Expand your experience with new exciting content!

・New Characters: Cabba, Frost
・New Teacher: Hit
・3 Parallel Quests
・5 Special/Ultimate Moves
2 Outfit/Accessory Sets
・5 Super Souls
Also includes assorted emotions, nicknames, and more.

You can get the content from Super Pack 1 with the DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 - Super Pass or by purchasing it individually!
name: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 - Super Pack 1
